sentences.sContent: we're being lured away by other people — people on Facebook, people in our inbox, people who write columns about giant superorganisms.
sentences.sContent_eng: we're being lured away by other people — people on Facebook, people in our inbox, people who write columns about giant superorganisms.
sentences.sCn: 我们也被其他人所诱惑，他们是飞播上的人，站内邮箱中的人以及巨大的超个体专栏作者。

trans.tranCn: [生]超个体(指群居昆虫等的群体)
